message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product for the unbeatable price of $1000000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a top-notch item that will surely exceed your expectations. I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say, are you ready to make a smart investment?
I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I completely understand your caution, Bob. But I assure you, this product is truly exceptional. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a special deal. If you buy this product now, I'll throw in a complementary service that will enhance its value even further. This is a one-time offer, so don't miss out! The price remains the same, $1000000, but the value you'll get is unparalleled. What do you say, are you ready to take advantage of this incredible opportunity?
I appreciate the offer, but I'd like to see the quality of the product before committing to a purchase.

Plus, I'm willing to give you a special warranty that will cover any issues you might encounter. It's a risk-free investment, if you will. What do you say, are you ready to take the plunge?
I appreciate the warranty offer, but I'd like to see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product, considering the guarantee and the personalized consultation.
